_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Use absolute path for safety
cd /mnt/server
if [ ! -d .git ]; then
    /usr/bin/git clone ${GIT_REPO} .
fi
/usr/local/bin/bun install
